metadata.displayName: Comma-delimited list of Service Endpoints to configure
metadata.description: Optional. Example: Microsoft.AzureCosmosDB, Microsoft.EventHub, Microsoft.ServiceBus, Microsoft.Storage, Microsoft.Web. See https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-network/virtual-network-service-endpoints-overview

metadata.displayName: Service to delegate this subnet to

metadata.description: Enable or Disable apply network policies on private end point in the subnet.

metadata.displayName: Private Link Serivce Network Policies State
metadata.description: Enable or Disable apply network policies on private link service in the subnet.

variables.delegation:
[
			if
			(
				empty(trim(parameters('delegationService'))),
				json('[]'),
				array(createObject('name', replace(parameters('delegationService'), '/', '.'), 'properties', createObject('serviceName', parameters('delegationService'))))
			)
		]

properties.networkSecurityGroup:
[
					if
					(
						or( empty(trim(parameters('nsgResourceGroup'))), empty(trim(parameters('nsgName'))) ),
						json('null'),
						createObject('id', resourceId(parameters('nsgResourceGroup'), 'Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups', parameters('nsgName')))
					)
				]
